description: This file implements management functions for object records and variable records within a data model, including retrieval, addition, and deletion of object and variable records, primarily for a DSL Home Model application.

classes.name: PDSLH_OBJ_RECORD_OBJECT
classes.description: Object representing a data model record with object children and variable children.

classes.name: PDSLH_VAR_RECORD_OBJECT
classes.description: Object representing a variable record within the data model.

classes.name: PSINGLE_LINK_ENTRY
classes.description: Pointer to a linked list entry.

classes.name: PANSC_TOKEN_CHAIN
classes.description: Chain of tokens used for recursive object path resolution.

classes.name: PANSC_STRING_TOKEN
classes.description: Single token in a token chain.

classes.name: PDSLH_OBJ_ENTITY_OBJECT
classes.description: Object representing the entity for object description.

classes.name: PDSLH_OBJ_CONTROLLER_OBJECT
classes.description: Controller object for managing object state.

classes.name: PDSLH_OBJCO_TABLE_OBJECT
classes.description: Object representing a table type object, with methods to check updates.

methods.name: ULONG DslhObjroGetObjRecordCount(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject)
methods.description: Returns the number of child object records.

methods.name: ANSC_HANDLE DslhObjroGetObjRecord(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,char * name)
methods.description: Retrieves a child object record by last name matching.

methods.name: ANSC_HANDLE DslhObjroGetObjRecord2(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hTokenChain)
methods.description: Recursively retrieves an object record based on a token chain.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS DslhObjroAddObjRecord(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hObjRecord)
methods.description: Adds a new object record and updates instance numbers if it is a table.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS DslhObjroDelAllObjRecords(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject)
methods.description: Deletes and destroys all child object records.

methods.name: ULONG DslhObjroGetVarRecordCount(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,BOOL bExcludeHidden)
methods.description: Returns the count of variable records, optionally excluding hidden parameters.

methods.name: ANSC_HANDLE DslhObjroGetVarRecord(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,char * name)
methods.description: Retrieves a variable record by name.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS DslhObjroAddVarRecord(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hVarRecord)
methods.description: Adds a variable record to the object.
